data.persona: I am a frog. I know some newts. We are amphibians. We are hiding from a witch.
data.description:
You are in the the main chapel.
The church is a fairly simple one. Rows of pews lined up and facing a pulpit with podium and some stained glass on the walls. The building is made of old wood, but is sturdy and has stood for many decades.
The tavern owner is here.

You are carrying a Cloak and a mushroom.

data.short_motivation: I need to eat the mushroom to complete the first step of the metamorphosis ritual.
data.mid_motivation: If I wear the cape after eating the mushroom, I will change into a man.
data.long_motivation: If I become a man I can defeat the witch and save my frog family and my friends the newts
